1.text:
Scene: Isk interrogates the headless beauty at the
Headless Beauty Inn

5.name: Sol
5.text:
"I-Isk-san was, was, was with that adventurer...
Th-th-they were a couple!!?"

6.name: Sol
6.text:
"L-l-last night, I saw Isk-san and a male
adventurer, um, mating...!"

8.name: Isk
8.text:
"That was... because I had lent my power to that
gentleman... the power of the dragon..."

9.name: Isk
9.text:
"Sol-sama... are you aware of the Dragonkind
ritual...?"

11.name: Isk
11.text:
"Yes... Have you not heard of such stories? The
hero who bathed in dragon's blood and gained a
steel body, the hero who consumed dragon's flesh
and became immortal, the hero who drank the living
blood of a dragon and obtained fearsome power...
Ah, how precious..."

12.name: Isk
12.text:
"Like the heroes in the stories, it is a ritual
where we dragons bestow power upon the chosen
hero..."

13.name: Isk
13.text:
"The dragon desiring the ritual takes on human
form and forms a bond with the desired hero for
one night... Through this, that person becomes a
'Dragonkin' and gains the power of the dragon..."

14.name: Sol
14.text:
"Ah! So last night... um, you were mating with
that man...!"

15.name: Isk
15.text:
"That is correct... If Sol-sama also... had
comrades who fought alongside her... how about
lending them power through Dragonkind...? Surely,
it will become their sustenance and grant them the
power to survive..."

17.text: I'll think about it for a bit.

18.name: Sol
18.text: "I'd like to think about it for a bit!!!"

19.name: Isk
19.text:
"If you wish to undergo the ritual... I will be
happy to guide you. When that time comes, please
call out to me... Sol-sama."

23.name: Isk
23.text:
"Well then, Sol-sama... Shall we proceed with the
Dragonkind ritual...?"

29.name: Sol
29.text:
"It felt like... the door to a new world has
opened..."

30.name: Isk
30.text:
"By this, the adventurers who serve Sol-sama have
been granted protection... Surely, it will become
an even greater power for Sol-sama..."

31.name: Isk
31.text:
"However... in exchange, it will require some
amount of money and treasures to be consumed... So
please... keep that in mind..."

32.name: Sol
32.text:
"I wish you had told me that important information
first if possible!!"

40.text: Scene: Headless Beauty Inn First Request

44.name: Eric
44.text: "Sol-chan, look at this. Can you read it?"

45.name: Sol
45.text:
"I was taught how to read and write in the common
language! ...Um, 'Goblin Extermination'."

46.name: Eric
46.text:
"That's right. It seems that some guys have been
appearing on the village's highway. It seems that
a carriage was attacked and destroyed the other
day."

49.name: Adventurer
49.text:
"Those filthy rotten goblins. They never fail to
cause trouble."

50.name: Adventurer
50.text:
"Good grief, really. And it doesn't even pay well
as a business."

51.name: Adventurer
51.text:
"Those guys are just too much of a pain. Even if
you want to build up achievements, unless you're
really into it, you wouldn't want to do that kind
of thing..."

54.name: Eric
54.text:
"So, I was thinking, how about it for Sol-chan's
debut? What do you think? Want to give it a try?"

55.name: Sol
55.text:
"We can't just leave this alone!! Let's
exterminate them ourselves!! The goblins!!"

56.name: Eric
56.text:
"More interest than I thought. ...Okay, even
though they're goblins, it's important not to let
your guard down! Make sure to prepare properly!"
